element.short: For testing purposes, not real usage
element.definition: A boolean value to indicate that this capability statement is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing), and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.
element.comment: Allows filtering of capability statement that are appropriate for use vs. not. This is labeled as "Is Modifier" because applications should not use an experimental capability statement in production.
element.requirements: Enables experimental content to be developed following the same lifecycle that would be used for a production-level capability statement.
